titleStmt.title: The Dutch armado a meer bravado. A poem upon the late engagement at sea. / By the author of the Dutch embargo.
titleStmt.author: Crouch, John, fl. 1660-1681.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Palmer at the Crown in Wesminster-Hall,

notesStmt.note: The author of "The Dutch embargo. ... 1665" is John Crouch.
Verse - "After a strict embargo on their fleet,".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
